review: The Fire TV packs extremely impressive hardware and an intuitive interface.  Coming from years of dedicated WD TV Live use as a media center, I have switched to the Fire TV, with XBMC/SPMC sideloaded.  Interfacing with my media is so much more pleasant.  Bar none, the Fire TV is the least expensive, most comprehensive XBMC hardware out there.
